title: Non-noetherian GL-algebras in characteristic two
abstract:
Over fields of characteristic two, we construct an infinite ascending chain
of GL-stable ideals in the coordinate ring of infinite skew-symmetric matrices.
This construction provides the first known example of a non-noetherian
GL-algebra, thereby resolving a long-standing open question in the area. Our
results build on the work of Draisma, Krasilnikov, and Krone.
